cache/com.jeanbarrossilva.orca.platform.cache/Cache

Cache

abstract class Cache<T>

Decides whether values should be fetched or have their cached version retrieved.

Parameters

context

Context through which an instance of the underlying CacheDatabase will be obtained.

name

Identifier for this Cache.

Functions

get
Link copied to clipboard
suspend fun get(key: String): T

Gets the value bound to the given key either by retrieving it from the storage if it's been cached or fetches it through the fetcher if it hasn't, respecting both the timeToIdle and the timeToLive.
